name: Doc Xmas
overview: The special Christmas release of the award winning Doc Cosmos contains some graphical updates to make Doc more seasonal along with 5 additional puzzling screens not found in the original game (and some minor bug fixes to fill out the stocking). Doc Xmas is on the very, very familiar search for a powerful alien device that is rumored to be able to allow the user to time travel. He arrives on the snowy alien planet to begin his quest to obtain the device but soon gets stuck in the underground complex. Use the device to switch between timelines (and control schemes)!
